titleStmt.title: A Relation of a sea-fight betweene the Duke of Guise and the Rochellers, the 27 of October, 1622 together with the submission of the Protestants in France, and the reducing of the town of Montpellier, and other of the chief towns in Languedoc : and lastly, the King's letter to the lords and sheriffs for the proclamation of the peace.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.L. for Thomas Lowns,

notesStmt.note: Includes French text to first part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
